title: Reverse a String
description: Write a function that reverses a given string.

title: Find the Largest Number in an Array
description: Write a function that finds the largest number in a given array.

title: Sum of Even Numbers
description: Write a function that calculates the sum of all even numbers in a given array.

title: Palindrome Check
description: Write a function that checks if a given string is a palindrome.

title: Fibonacci Sequence
description: Write a function that returns the nth number in the Fibonacci sequence.

title: Factorial of a Number
description: Write a function that calculates the factorial of a given number.

title: Sort an Array of Strings
description: Write a function that sorts an array of strings in alphabetical order.

title: Find Prime Numbers
description: Write a function that returns an array of prime numbers up to a given number.

title: Merge Two Sorted Arrays
description: Write a function that merges two sorted arrays into one sorted array.

title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
description: Write a function that returns the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.
